imdb.plot outline: "Spur des Verbrechens" reveals questions and tells fascinating criminal cases. The topic spectrum ranges from murder to fraud to political terror and corruption. The program not only accesses current criminal cases, but also spectacular cases from the past.
imdb.title: Spur des Verbrechens -das Kriminalmagazin aus dem Südwesten
akas: Spur des Verbrechens -das Kriminalmagazin aus dem Südwesten (Germany)
plot: "Spur des Verbrechens" reveals questions and tells fascinating criminal cases. The topic spectrum ranges from murder to fraud to political terror and corruption. The program not only accesses current criminal cases, but also spectacular cases from the past.
